projects: [{"title":"Pattern Recognition","start_date":"Aug 2011","end_date":"Dec 2011","description":"Creating an efficient MATLAB code to be converted to an assembly language code, to extract the serial number from a currency note."},{"title":"ECG Filter","start_date":"Jan 2011","end_date":"May 2011","description":"Design implementation of a band stop filter to be used for ECGs, developed on a DSP Kit using Code Composer Studio."},{"title":"Microprocessor-based Electric Oven Control","start_date":"Jan 2010","end_date":"May 2010","description":"Implemented a microprocessor based code and interface design for the functioning of an electric oven."},{"title":"Photo Pad","start_date":"Feb 2010","end_date":"Mar 2010","description":"A low-cost LED-based apparatus which traces the movement on a board, and displays it on a screen."}]
